metadata.name: PCRE.NET Package Temp Files
metadata.comment: Detects processes creating temp files related to PCRE.NET package

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\ba9ea7344a4a5f591d6e5dc32a13494b\\')))

output.summary: Detects processes creating temp files related to PCRE.NET package
